# ColumnSelection.include(columnNames:)

**Case**

Selects only the specified columns.

## Declaration

```swift
case include(columnNames: [String])
```

## Column selection types

- **ColumnSelection.all**: Select all columns in the data frame.
- **ColumnSelection.exclude(columnNames:)**: Selects all columns except the specified columns.
- **ColumnSelection.numeric**: Select all numeric columns in the data frame.

items.description: Select all columns in the data frame.
items.name: ColumnSelection.all

items.description: Selects all columns except the specified columns.
